summary: Highly skilled and accomplished DevOps and Linux Administrator with over 10 years of experience in designing, implementing, and optimizing robust IT infrastructures. Seeking a challenging position where I can leverage my extensive expertise in DevOps methodologies, automation, and Linux administration to drive continuous improvement, enhance system reliability, and optimize operational efficiency.

experience.description: Implementing and managing robust and secure DevOps practices in HIPAA compliant environments, software delivery, enhance security and compliance measures, and drive continuous improvement to support the organization's mission of delivering secure and reliable healthcare services.

Managing day-to-day IT operations and liaising with global teams to resolve technical issues. Accomplishing IT staff results by communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, and appraising job results; coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; initiating, coordinating, and enforcing systems, policies, and procedures.

Build services relationship with customers and conduct service reviews for key customers. Review performance reports, service improvements, service quality and processes. Solution design, network architecture development, validation, implementation, and overall integration of products and SLA Compliance.

Responsibled for managing both low and high-severity incidents across the entire incident life-cycle in accordance with availability, resolution and restoration SLAs,Problem and incident Management. Monitoring, Operation and Maintenance of Datacenter and DR Sites. Performing corrective and Preventive Maintenance actions recommended by Quality Assurance Team for the resolution of non-compliance with standards detected through monitoring and auditing of processes and procedures

projects.name: V-Secur™ (RFID Integrated Building Management System)
projects.description: V-Secur™ is a centrally managed identification and resource management solution utilizing Automatic Identification and Data Capture (AIDC) technologies such as RFID and Biometrics.

projects.name: VO8 (Process Automation for Governance)
projects.description: The solution aims to offer a smooth transition to a paper-less environment by automating standard business processes, especially for the government and semi-government sectors.

projects.name: Vdesk™ (Helpdesk Manager)
projects.description: V-Desk is a web-based helpdesk automation tool that typically uses Software as a Service (SaaS) model for addressing technical complaints.
